title: mid-adc-jng main LF 5v5 team
body:
I’m currently in B1 but slowly getting out due to me not playing this account at the start of the season, had a family member play
In recent season I was S1 playing with gold plat people 
I can play all roles that need to be played
I’m also a great listener and a very fast learner
Currently just looking for a serious 5s team
Add me in game Hektik418 to discuss anything

replies.body: i can adc if you want my champ pool is twitch vayne and kalista and i main adc and i can hard carry any1 if i get a good support that can get me through laning phase
